text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Keep your eyes peeled for cosmic debris: Andrew Westphal about Stardust@home
text.summary: Wikinews interviews Andrew Westphal, director of NASA's Stardust@home project, which allows users to inspect vast amounts of data using a Virtual Microscope in their browser for interstellar dust particles, collected from comet 81P/Wild by NASA's Stardust space capsule.
